def smallest_distinct_integers(numbers):
    distinct_numbers = list(set(numbers))
    distinct_numbers.sort()
    return distinct_numbers[:6]

    distinct_numbers = list(set(numbers))
    distinct_numbers.sort()
    return distinct_numbers[:4]

    return distinct_numbers[:0]

def smallest_distinct_integers(numbers):
    distinct_numbers = list(set(numbers))
    distinct_numbers.sort()
    return distinct_numbers[:-5]
